de.bioforscher.singa.mathematics.matrices

Class FastMatrices

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.bioforscher.singa.mathematics.matrices.FastMatrices

  • public class FastMatrices
extends java.lang.Object
    Fast(ish) Matrix operations you can use if you are sure what you are doing.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FastMatrices() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Matrix assembleMatrixFromRows(java.util.List<Vector> rowVectors)
      Creates a Matrix from the given row Vectors.
      static RegularMatrix createRegularMatrix(double[][] values)
      Creates a regular matrix without checking if the values are well formed or symmetric.
      static SquareMatrix createSquareMatrix(double[][] values)
      Creates a symmetric matrix without checking if the array has the right format or has to be compacted.
      static SymmetricMatrix createSymmetricMatrix(double[][] values)
      Creates a symmetric matrix without checking if the array has the right format or has to be compacted.

    • Constructor Detail

      • FastMatrices

        public FastMatrices()

    • Method Detail

      • createRegularMatrix

        public static RegularMatrix createRegularMatrix(double[][] values)
        Creates a regular matrix without checking if the values are well formed or symmetric.
        Parameters:
        values - Values the matrix should have.
        Returns:
        A regular matrix.

      • createSquareMatrix

        public static SquareMatrix createSquareMatrix(double[][] values)
        Creates a symmetric matrix without checking if the array has the right format or has to be compacted. The method requires a jagged lower triangle array like: 
         {{1.0}, {2.0, 5.0}, {3.0, 6.0, 9.0}}
        Parameters:
        values - Jagged lower triangle array with the values.
        Returns:
        A symmetric matrix.

      • createSymmetricMatrix

        public static SymmetricMatrix createSymmetricMatrix(double[][] values)
        Creates a symmetric matrix without checking if the array has the right format or has to be compacted. The method requires a jagged lower triangle array like: 
         {{1.0}, {2.0, 5.0}, {3.0, 6.0, 9.0}}
        Parameters:
        values - Jagged lower triangle array with the values.
        Returns:
        A symmetric matrix.

      • assembleMatrixFromRows

        public static Matrix assembleMatrixFromRows(java.util.List<Vector> rowVectors)
        Creates a Matrix from the given row Vectors. No checks for validly formed row Vectors are done, use with care.
        Parameters:
        rowVectors - The Vectors that resemble the rows of the new Matrix.
        Returns:
        A new Matrix.
